description.displayText: I hired Preethi based on a close friend's review of her and she was an extreme help to my daughter and family. She tutored my daughter in ELA and helped improve her scores, but also made my daughter look forward to her tutoring sessions! Preethi is such a positive, helpful, and caring, individual. We also hired her as a part-time babysitter because she got along with my daughter so well. She helped around the house, took my kids to the park, and helped with my personal errands and tasks. I 100% recommend her for any job position you are looking to hire her for.

description.displayText:
A friend of mine recommended Preethi as a tutor for my child and she was such an extraordinary help.
Not only did she help my daughter do better in reading and writing, but my daughter always looked forward to her tutoring sessions. Preethi also ended up as a part-time babysitter for our family and was without a doubt, such a helpful, positive, and caring addition to our family. I 100% strongly recommend her for any job opportunity you may be looking to hire her for.
